metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2781 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description: chroot in GNU coreutils, when used with --userspec, allows local users to escape to the parent session via a crafted TIOCSTI ioctl call, which pushes characters to the terminal's input buffer.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2017-08-01, no viable solution ccdm94> as of 2022-02-01, no viable solution

criterions.comment: coreutils package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-02-01').
